Up for sale is a like-new Diana RWS 34 Panther Pro Compact .177 cal Air Rifle. The rifle is packaged in the original box, with an RWS 3-9x40 AO Scope & RWS 1-piece mount.  The scope and mount have not been opened or used. Everything is packaged as new.

When I took apart 1 of the 2 rifles to install a Vortek kit, I noticed that there were no lubes anywhere.  The rifle was dry as a bone.  So to sweeten the deal for this rifle, I de-burred the compression chamber using Swedish files, and then lubed the entire rifle.  The compression chamber was burnished with JM Moly Paste. I then reassembled the rifle and fired 2 shots with H&N FTT 8.64gr pellets to confirm that everything worked.  I can't say that it's as smooth as a Vortek kit, but it's better than a stock rifle with no buzz after the shot.  Lastly, the entire action was cleaned and then wiped down with Ballistol Lube.  I then reattached the stock and placed the rifle back in the plastic with everything packaged up as new.  I did not Loctite any of the screws, in case the buyer want to disassemble the rifle to check it out.
